name: WolfQuest Saved Game
summary: Learn about .WOLFQUEST files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: For Windows, WolfQuest saved games are created by default in the MyDocuments\​WolfQuest\​ or MyDocuments\​WolfQuest2\​ directory. For Mac, they are stored in the WolfQuest or WolfQuest2 directory within the user's home directory.
In WolfQuest, players learn about wolf ecology by assuming the role of a wild wolf in Yellowstone National Park. WolfQuest was developed jointly by the Minnesota Zoo and Eduweb.

description: Saved game created by WolfQuest, a 3D wildlife simulation game; contains the wolf name, world location, hunting experience, and other information about the progress in life, such as the status in a wolf pack or whether the wolf has mated; used for saving and loading game progress.
